GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get properties of the provided bare metal machine.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Patch properties of the provided bare metal machine, or update tags associated with the bare metal machine. Properties and tag updates can be done independently.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Get a list of bare metal machines in the provided resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetNetworkCloudBareMetalMachines
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Get a list of bare metal machines in the provided subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: Cordon
OtherOperations.Description: Cordon the provided bare metal machine's Kubernetes node.

OtherOperations.Name: PowerOff
OtherOperations.Description: Power off the provided bare metal machine.

OtherOperations.Name: Reimage
OtherOperations.Description: Reimage the provided bare metal machine.

OtherOperations.Name: Replace
OtherOperations.Description: Replace the provided bare metal machine.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: Restart the provided bare metal machine.

OtherOperations.Name: RunCommand
OtherOperations.Description: Run the command or the script on the provided bare metal machine. The URL to storage account with the command execution results and the command exit code can be retrieved from the operation status API once available.

OtherOperations.Name: RunDataExtracts
OtherOperations.Description: Run one or more data extractions on the provided bare metal machine. The URL to storage account with the command execution results and the command exit code can be retrieved from the operation status API once available.

OtherOperations.Name: RunReadCommands
OtherOperations.Description: Run one or more read-only commands on the provided bare metal machine. The URL to storage account with the command execution results and the command exit code can be retrieved from the operation status API once available.

OtherOperations.Name: Start
OtherOperations.Description: Start the provided bare metal machine.

OtherOperations.Name: Uncordon
OtherOperations.Description: Uncordon the provided bare metal machine's Kubernetes node.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get properties of the provided cloud services network.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create a new cloud services network or update the properties of the existing cloud services network.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Update properties of the provided cloud services network, or update the tags associated with it. Properties and tag updates can be done independently.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Delete the provided cloud services network.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Get a list of cloud services networks in the provided resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetNetworkCloudCloudServicesNetworks
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Get a list of cloud services networks in the provided subscription.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the properties of the provided cluster manager.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create a new cluster manager or update properties of the cluster manager if it exists.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Patch properties of the provided cluster manager, or update the tags assigned to the cluster manager. Properties and tag updates can be done independently.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Get a list of cluster managers in the provided resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetNetworkCloudClusterManagers
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Get a list of cluster managers in the provided subscription.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get properties of the provided cluster.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create a new cluster or update the properties of the cluster if it exists.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Patch the properties of the provided cluster, or update the tags associated with the cluster. Properties and tag updates can be done independently.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Get a list of clusters in the provided resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetNetworkCloudClusters
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Get a list of clusters in the provided subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: Deploy
OtherOperations.Description: Deploy the cluster to the provided rack.

OtherOperations.Name: UpdateVersion
OtherOperations.Description: Update the version of the provided cluster to one of the available supported versions.

GetOperations.Description: Get properties of the provided the Kubernetes cluster.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create a new Kubernetes cluster or update the properties of the existing one.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Patch the properties of the provided Kubernetes cluster, or update the tags associated with the Kubernetes cluster. Properties and tag updates can be done independently.

ListOperations.Description: Get a list of Kubernetes clusters in the provided resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetNetworkCloudKubernetesClusters
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Get a list of Kubernetes clusters in the provided subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: RestartNode
OtherOperations.Description: Restart a targeted node of a Kubernetes cluster.
